day_one.title: Dumbshidas!
day_one.body: There will two rounds in first you will have to act on the the movie given in the chit.In second you will be given one advertisement tag line.

day_one.title: Dance Face off
day_one.body: You have to dance on any random song,Two people will face off with each other

day_one.title: Lock Up
day_one.body: One male and one female will be tied with hands of different year and the one who will survive till end will win.

day_one.title: Treasure Hunt
day_one.body: Team will be provided with a hint and have to find the treasure.

day_one.title: Rock Band
day_one.body: Team will have to play bands and the best team will win.

day_two.title: Rangoli
day_two.body: Each team will create a small rangoli in 1 hour the best rangoli will win.

day_two.title: Street Play
day_two.body: Each team has to perform a street play(NUkkad Natak) with a strong message,Team has to arrange props of there own.

day_two.title: Drama Audition
day_two.body: There will be audition for drama and finally two teams will be selected to perform in traditional night.

day_two.title: Traditional Night
day_two.body: All have to wear Traditional dresses,And there will be many performances like Drama,Singing, Danceing etc.

day_three.title: Masterchef
day_three.body: Each team will bring one coocked item of there own,In second round they have to coock with the given ingredients.

day_three.title: Spell Bee
day_three.body: Each person has to spell the give word by judges,and each word is eliminating.

day_three.title: Tambola
day_three.body: TYou can win exciting prizes here, all money collected in return of ticket will be donated.

day_three.title: Cultural Night
day_three.body: All have to wear western dresses,And there will be many performances by Sharukh Khan and Anushka Sharma
